properties.title: Nobody Likes Me
properties.description: An (arguably too young) boy holds a mobile phone, his face contorted with the agonising discovery that nobody has liked his latest Instagram post.

properties.title: My God, Help Me to Survive This Deadly Love
properties.description: Vrubel’s mural is an interpretation of a photograph taken in 1979, at the 30th anniversary of the celebration of the German Democratic Republic (GDR).

properties.title: Faith in Women
properties.description: Faith in Women explores a somewhat feminised version of war; where a baby pink tanker nonchalantly runs over an unsuspecting rabbit, and dozens of guileless skulls congregate beneath a vibrant rainbow of colour

properties.title: Spiderman
properties.description: Painted superheroes, gaming icons, fantastic figures… Like his pixelated characters, Invader invades the public space, and has been doing so since 1998.
